H0.text: What TV show takes place at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital. ER

H1.text: What TV show takes place at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital. House M.D.

H2.text: What TV show takes place at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital. Scrubs

H3.text: What TV show takes place at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital. Grey's

A4.text: ER follows the inner life of the emergency room of Cook County General Hospital, a fictionalized version of the real Cook County Hospital.

A5.text: Grey's Anatomy is an American medical drama television series focusing on the personal and professional lives of surgical interns, residents, and attendings at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.
